thread.title: Mia

author: Mia
title: Mia
text: Thank you iAccidentLawyer. staff here were sympathetic and welcoming. They assisted me throughout my recovery all the way to the settlement. They were great in talking to debtors/bill collectors, so I was not constantly harassed. They even compiled all the debts I owed due to the accident and paid them off after settlement. After all the hassle, and nearly a year later, the insurance company finally settled with me for considerably more than they offered right after the accident. Will continue to recommend Accident Attorneys' Group to all my friends.
